# Aufgabe 1

Download stocks

```{r stocks, echo=TRUE}
# Load stocks
x <- get.hist.quote(start="2006-01-01", instrument="vow.de", quote="AdjClose")
y <- get.hist.quote(start="2006-01-01", instrument="dai.de", quote="AdjClose")

# Create returns
rx <-diff(log(x))
ry <- diff(log(y))
```
